title: Mac problems?
body: Okay so im playing on a mac everything works great but after champion select it just sits on the screen and doesnt take me to the loading screen. so i exit and re login and it works and puts me in the game. help

replies.body: You might be having a connection problem in this case.  Specifically,  your network is going dormant after champion select and not connecting to the game server.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
